resources.string: Transfer some images or videos from your Switch to get started
That doesn\'t look right. Please scan the Step 1 barcode on your Switch.
Press the button below or go to your device\'s WiFi settings and connect to the network listed on your Switch. Press the help button above for more information.
Your files will be visible in this app as well as your gallery app. Press below to return to the gallery

There was an issue connecting to your Switch. This is probably due to a known Android bug.\n\nFully restarting the app (remove from recents list) or using manual mode (wifi cog icon on scanning screen) typically resolves the issue.
Lost connection to your console. Make sure your console has not entered sleep mode and try connecting again.
An unknown error has occurred. Make sure your console has not gone to sleep and try connecting again.
Unable to delete image. Try again or use your device\'s gallery/file manager.
Are you sure you want to delete this file?
Order by the date the media was taken
Order by the date the media was transferred
Tutorial will be shown every time
Logo and Illustrations by Jesse Ramey

Neither this app nor its developer are affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with Nintendo Co., Ltd or its subsidiaries.\n\nAll product and company names are the registered trademarks of their original owners. The use of any trademark is for identification and reference purposes only and does not imply any association with the trademark holder.
Open the album on the Home menu and select a photo or video to transfer
Press A and choose "Send to Smartphone". If you have selected a photo, you can choose "Send a Batch" to send multiple photos at once.
On the next screen, scan the QR code on the left side of the Switch\'s screen. Switch Transfer tool will handle the rest!
In order to detect when you\'ve connected to your Switch, you will need to grant location access. We do not collect your physical location.
Open the album on the Home menu and select a photo or video to transfer
Press A and choose "Send to Smartphone". If you have selected a photo, you can choose "Send a Batch" to send multiple photos at once.
On the next screen, press "Trouble connecting"
After this tutorial, connect to the network listed on the Switch. If the network is saved, long-press it and choose modify, as the password changes each time you transfer.
If you get a notification that the network has no internet access, choose to stay connected. Then return to this app and Switch Transfer tool will handle the rest!
Location access is required in order to connect manually. Without it, we cannot tell when you\'ve connected to your Switch
Without location access, we are unable to detect your Switch.
Appears when a manual connection has succeeded if you\'re not in the app
Tap here to return to the app
